vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
WhaleGiveaway1.GetFreebie (patch_6.sol#8-13) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(this.balance) (patch_6.sol#11)

solc-version
